#bnlearn::mmhc
Hybrid learning using the Max-Min Hill Climbing algorithm.

-------------------- -------------------------
**Package:**         bnlearn                  

**Function:**        mmhc                     

**Input:**           data.frame               

**Output:**          S3 object bn             

**Documentation:**   http://www.bnlearn.com/  
-------------------- -------------------------




*Minimal code example:*

```` {r, eval = FALSE}
#Load mixed numerical and categorical dataset mixData
load(url("https://github.com/annennenne/causalDisco/raw/master/data/exampledata_mixData.rda"))

#Load package
library(bnlearn)

#Learn causal structure using mmhc():
#Mandatory arguments: 
##The dataset as a data.frame
bnlearn_mmhc_out <- mmhc(mixData)

#Print output
bnlearn_mmhc_out

#Plot output
plot(bnlearn_mmhc_out)

```
